repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Folio numbers are lost due to broken margins so it is difficult to say how much text is lost. There are two stickers with the title and folio information found; One has title written in grath script in black ink pen and one has in roman. Both the notes mention samilar information about the Manuscript - Smṛticandrikā Dharma, Grantha, 120 p . 8L. No. 17. The fisrt note in addition with the above information indiacates the condition of the manuscript; it mentions 'little injuared'.

msItem.title: Smṛticandrikā
msItem.incipit:
1v1 ranyadyavi syāt paścādhigatanai (2 illegible syllables.) (gap of 3-4 syllables due to torn folio.) [trā] tyarthadarmmayorasvātantryāditi [dha] (gap of a few syllables due to damaged folio.)
1v2 (gap of few syllables due to torn folio.) taṃ pra (gap of 5 syllables as the space left empty by the scribe.) vitarivṛtya
msItem.explicit: xv 10 gateti sā (gap of 9 syllables due to broken folio,) vamanviśeṣaniṣṭhāṃ [tatrāha?] pāṇīmudyutyadaṇḍyaṃ vā pāṇī

support.p: Thick wooden guard folio newer than the manuscript.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals but mostly lost due to damaged folio.
supportDesc.condition: Folio broken. Folio numbers are lost due to broken margins. Worm holes , delicate folio.

listBibl.bibl: Smriticandrika by Deven Bhatta Vol 1-4 edited by L Srinivasacarya, Pandit Govt, Oriental Library, Mysore. Oriental Library Series, edited by Pandits under the supervision of the Curator, Govt Oriental Library, Mysore . Bibliotheca Sanskritika no. 43 1914

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Sqare bracket is used for Inferred word.
